title: Bit Load Function
description:
BIT_LOAD_B copies the bit at VAL to the bit in the position N in byte IN.
The least signifcant bit B0 is described by the position 0.
name: BIT_LOAD_B

input.name: IN
input.description: The input BYTE value that will be modified.

input.name: VAL
input.description: A boolean flag that determines whether to set or clear the bit at the specified position.

input.name: POS
input.description: The position of the bit in the BYTE that needs to be set or cleared.

output.name: BIT_LOAD_B
output.description: The modified BYTE after the bit operation.

return_value.description: The value of the modified BYTE after the operation.
